message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I believe it would be perfect for you. I'm offering it to you at $15,000.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my needs. I appreciate the offer, but I am only able to pay up to $8,000 for the product. Could we possibly come to an agreement within this budget?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer.  I understand your budget, but $15,000 is already a very competitive price for this product. Could you meet me halfway at $11,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but unfortunately I still cannot exceed $8,000 for the product. Would it be possible to negotiate down to $9,000?
